We offer Lunar Orbit, Moon Surface Walk, and Luxury Orbital Suite packages. Each includes training, accommodation, and guided experiences.
To check your booking status, please provide your registered email or contact our support team.

Prepare by maintaining good health, following our training program, and packing light. We'll guide you through every step!
You can reach us via the contact links at the bottom of this page or email support@lunaria.com.
Lunaria is a pioneer in interstellar tourism, making lunar travel accessible, safe, and unforgettable for everyone.
Pricing varies by package: Lunar Orbit starts at $250,000, Moon Surface Walk at $500,000, and Luxury Orbital Suite at $1,000,000. Contact us for detailed quotes.
Your safety is our top priority. All missions are insured and follow strict safety protocols with experienced astronauts and medical staff onboard.
Trips range from 5 days (Lunar Orbit) to 12 days (Luxury Orbital Suite). Each package includes pre-flight training and post-mission recovery.
Enjoy gourmet meals designed by top chefs, with options for various dietary needs. All food is prepared for space travel and served fresh.
Participants must be between 18 and 65 years old and pass a basic medical screening. Contact us for exceptions or special cases.
You can cancel up to 60 days before launch for a full refund. See our cancellation policy for details or contact support for assistance.
All travelers undergo a 2-week training program covering safety, zero-gravity adaptation, and mission protocols before departure.
Our orbital suites offer private rooms with Earth and Moon views, Wi-Fi, entertainment, and personal attendants for your comfort.
High-speed Wi-Fi and communication systems are available throughout your journey, so you can stay connected with loved ones.
Launches may be delayed due to weather or technical checks. We keep you updated and provide accommodation if rescheduling is needed.
